Assosi kho rājā madhuro avantiputto samaṇo khalu bho kaccāno madhurāya viharati gundhāvane taṁ kho pana bhavantaṁ kaccānaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato paṇḍito viyatto Yu. vayatto. medhāvī bahussuto cittakathī kalyāṇapaṭibhāṇo vuḍḍho ceva arahā ca sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṁ arahataṁ dassanaṁ hotīti.
